articles.description: “Honestly, props to them for sticking with what makes them different and doing it their way."
articles.content: An electric vehicle with flex and intentionally excessive engine noise keeps rolling toward its release in the form of the Dodge Charger Daytona SRT. The YouTube channel HotCars reported on this conc… [+2526 chars]

articles.author: Joanna Stern
articles.title: When Our Smartphones Become Windows to a War - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Phones have enabled people to bear witness to unimaginable images of human suffering—in real time
